Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.QuizzesUIBuilder
    Use QuizzesComponentBuilder instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuizzesBuilder
    Use Quizzes instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.QuizzesUIConstants
    Use AuthoringFieldType, AnswerFieldType or EmbeddedAnswersEditorMode instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuizzesConstants.PROPERTY_AUXILIAR_TEXT
    Use QuizzesConstants.PROPERTY_AUXILIARY_TEXT instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question.addAssertion(String, int, int, String[])
    Use Slot.setSyntax(SyntaxName), AuthorAnswer.setComparison(ComparisonName) or AuthorAnswer.addNewValidation(ValidationName) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.getAnswerGrade(int, int, Question)
    Use QuestionInstance.getGrade(Slot, AuthorAnswer) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.getAssertionChecks(int, int)
    Use QuestionInstance.getChecks(Slot, AuthorAnswer) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.getCompoundAnswerGrade(int, int, int, Question)
    Use QuestionInstance.getCompoundGrade(Slot, AuthorAnswer, int) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question.getCorrectAnswer(int)
    Use AuthorAnswer.getValue() instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question.getCorrectAnswersLength()
    Use the arrays Question.getSlots() and Slot.getAuthorAnswers() instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.getStudentAnswer(int)
    Use QuestionInstance.getSlotAnswer(Slot) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.getStudentAnswersLength()
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.isAnswerCorrect(int)
    Use QuestionInstance.isSlotAnswerCorrect(Slot) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuizzesBuilder.newQuestionInstance()
    Use QuizzesBuilder.newQuestionInstance(Question) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.setAuxiliarText(String)
    Use QuestionInstance.setAuxiliaryText(String) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question.setCorrectAnswer(int, String)
    Use AuthorAnswer.setValue(String) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question.setOption(String, String)
    Use {Question.setProperty(PropertyName, String)} instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance.setStudentAnswer(int, String)
    Use QuestionInstance.setSlotAnswer(Slot, String) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.AuthoringField.showAuxiliarCas(boolean)
    Use AuthoringField.showAuxiliaryCas(boolean) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.AuthoringField.showAuxiliarCasReplaceEditor(boolean)
    Use AuthoringField.showAuxiliaryCasReplaceEditor(boolean) instead.
    com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.AuthoringField.showAuxiliarTextInput(boolean)
    Use AuthoringField.showAuxiliaryTextInput(boolean) instead.
